001    package net.jmatrix.eproperties.cache;
002    
003    import java.io.*;
004    import java.net.*;
005    import java.text.*;
006    import java.util.Date;
007    
008    import org.apache.commons.logging.*;
009    
010    /**
011     * The CacheManager implements many simple functions necessary for caching
012     * properties.  Properties are cached for safe failover to the most 
013     * recently used values in the case of failure of network based resources.
014     * Network based resources could include: http or NFS file URLs, or JDBC based
015     * properties, or indeed any custom derrived properties includer.
016     *
017     * Properties loaded with non-stream based loading (such as Method based
018     * proeprties inclusion) are not cached. 
019     *
020     * To maintain transparency, we will use a Tee type input stream bound to a
021     * buffered writer to minimize performance impacts.
022     */
023    public class CacheManager {
024       static final Log log=LogFactory.getLog(CacheManager.class);
025       
026       static CacheManager instance=null;
027       
028       static final String CACHE_ROOT_PROPERTY="eproperties.cache.root";
029       
030       File cacheRoot=null;
031       
032       /* 
033        * This depends on the target system.  If the filesystem is NFS or otherwise
034        * network based, then creating a local disk cache of file URLs makes sense.
035        * However if the filesystem is local disk - cacheing such URLs is redundant, 
036        * wasteful, and can lead to errors.  (Ie, FileNotFound may be more valid
037        * than running with a cached file.)  
038        */
039       boolean CACHE_FILE_URLS=false;
040       
041       boolean ONLINE=true;
042       String state="ONLINE";
043       
044       /** */
045       private CacheManager() {
046          if (System.getProperty(CACHE_ROOT_PROPERTY) != null) {
047             cacheRoot=new File(System.getProperty(CACHE_ROOT_PROPERTY));
048          } else {
049             cacheRoot=new File(System.getProperty("user.home")+"/.eproperties/cache/");
050          }
051          
052          if (!cacheRoot.exists()) {
053             boolean success=cacheRoot.mkdirs();
054             
055             if (!success) {
056                ONLINE=false;
057                state="Cannot create cache root dir at "+
058                      cacheRoot.getAbsolutePath();
059                log.error(state);
060                log.error("CacheManager will be unavilable for read/write property caching.");
061             }
062          }
063          
064          if (!cacheRoot.canWrite()) {
065             ONLINE=false;
066             state="Cannot write in cache dir.  CacheManager unavailable.";
067             log.error(state);
068             log.error("CacheManager will be unavilable for read/write property caching.");
069          }
070          
071          log.info("EProperties: CacheManager online at "+cacheRoot);
072       }
073       
074       /** */
075       public static CacheManager getInstance() {
076          if (instance == null) {
077             synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
078                if (instance == null) {
079                   instance=new CacheManager();
080                }
081             }
082          }
083          return instance;
084       }
085       
086       /** Disables all properties stream caching. */
087       public void disable() {
088          ONLINE=false;
089          state="Disabled by CacheManager.disable()";
090       }
091       
092       public void enable() {
093          ONLINE=true;
094          state="ONLINE";
095       }
096       
097       /**
098        * This method will return an input stream based on a URL.
099        * 
100        * In the case where the stream IS available from the URL, the contents
101        * of that stream will be cached.  In the case where the steram is NOT 
102        * available, we will attempt to get the stream from the cache.
103        * 
104        * @param url
105        * @return
106        */
107       public InputStream getInputStream(URL url) throws IOException {
108          if (url == null) {
109             throw new IOException ("Cannot open input stream for null URL.");
110          }
111          
112          if (!ONLINE)
113             return url.openStream();
114          
115          InputStream pis=null;
116          String surl=url.toExternalForm();
117          
118          File cacheFile=getCacheFileForURL(url);
119          
120          log.debug("CacheFile: "+cacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
121          
122          try {
123             //InputStream ris=url.openStream();
124             URLConnection urlConn=url.openConnection();
125             
126             long lastMod=urlConn.getLastModified();
127             
128             InputStream ris=urlConn.getInputStream();
129             
130             // Ok, we have an input stream, so lets create a cache stream
131             // and return it.
132             try {
133                OutputStream cos=getCacheOutputStream(surl, cacheFile);
134                CacheInputStream cis=new CacheInputStream(ris, cos);
135                
136                cis.setLastModified(lastMod);
137                pis=cis;
138             } catch (Exception ex) {
139                // Can't create cache file or stream.
140                log.warn("Cannot create cache output stream with file "+cacheFile);
141                log.debug("Continuing with remote input stream as properties stream. Uncached.");
142                pis=ris;
143             }
144          } catch (Exception ex) {
145             log.warn("Remote stream unavailable for URL "+url+" due to "+ex.toString());
146             log.debug("Remote stream stack: ", ex);
147             
148             if (cacheFile.exists() && cacheFile.canRead()) {
149                log.info("Cache file "+cacheFile.getAbsolutePath()+" exists. Attempting to use.");
150                DateFormat df=new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MMM.yyyy HH:mm:ss");
151                log.info("Cache file lastMod is "+df.format(new Date(cacheFile.lastModified())));
152                FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(cacheFile);
153                pis=new CacheInputStream(fis, null);
154             } else {
155                throw new IOException("Properties cache file does not exist at "+
156                      cacheFile.getAbsolutePath()+" for URL "+url);
157             }
158          }
159          
160          return pis;
161       }
162       
163       /** */
164       public InputStream getInputStream(InputStream is, URL url) {
165          return getInputStream(is, (url == null? null:url.toExternalForm()));
166       }
167       
168       /** */
169       public InputStream getInputStream(InputStream is, String surl) {
170          if (!ONLINE)
171             return is;
172          
173          if (surl == null)
174             return is;
175          
176          // This is already a cache stream.
177          if (is instanceof CacheInputStream)
178             return is;
179          
180          File cacheFile=getCacheFileForURLString(surl);
181          log.debug("CacheFile: "+cacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
182          
183          InputStream pis=null;
184          // Ok, we have an input stream, so lets create a cache stream
185          // and return it.
186          try {
187             OutputStream cos=getCacheOutputStream(surl, cacheFile);
188             CacheInputStream cis=new CacheInputStream(is, cos);
189             pis=cis;
190          } catch (Exception ex) {
191             // Can't create cache file or stream.
192             log.warn("Cannot create cache output stream with file "+cacheFile);
193             log.debug("Continuing with remote input stream as properties stream. Uncached.");
194             pis=is;
195          }
196          return pis;
197       }
198       
199       /**
200        * Here we create a .pcache file by translating the full URL into a 
201        * directory structure.
202        **/
203       private File getCacheFileForURL(URL url) {
204          String surl=url.toExternalForm();
205          return getCacheFileForURLString(surl);
206       }
207       
208       /** */
209       private File getCacheFileForURLString(String surl) {
210          surl=surl.replace("\\", "/");
211          surl=surl.replace("//", "/");
212          surl=surl.replace(":/", "/");
213          surl=surl.replace(":", "-");
214          
215          String filename=null;
216          String path=null;
217          if (!surl.contains("/")) {
218             filename=surl+".pcache";
219             path="";
220          }
221          if (surl.endsWith("/")) {
222             filename="index.pcache";
223             path=surl;
224          } else {
225             filename=surl.substring(surl.lastIndexOf("/")+1)+".pcache"; 
226             path=surl.substring(0, surl.lastIndexOf("/"));
227          }
228          
229          File file=new File(cacheRoot, path+"/"+filename);
230          try {
231             file=file.getCanonicalFile();
232          } catch (IOException ex) {
233             // this should really never happen...
234             log.warn("Cannot form canonical file for file: "+file.getAbsolutePath());
235          }
236          
237          return file;
238       }
239       
240       /** */
241       private OutputStream getCacheOutputStream(String surl, File cacheFile) 
242       throws IOException {
243          FileOutputStream fos=null;
244          if (surl.startsWith("file")) {
245             if (CACHE_FILE_URLS) {
246                createDirsForFile(cacheFile);
247                fos=new FileOutputStream(cacheFile, false);
248             }
249          } else {
250             createDirsForFile(cacheFile);
251             fos=new FileOutputStream(cacheFile, false);
252          }
253          return fos;
254       }
255       
256       /** */
257       private void createDirsForFile(File f) {
258          File dir=f.getParentFile();
259          if (dir.exists()) 
260             return;
261          dir.mkdirs();
262       }
263    }
